ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Visit name
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2

ElementDescription: In the past four weeks, did the subject have difficulty or need help with: Writing checks, paying bills, or balancing a checkbook
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Assembling tax records, business affairs, or other papers
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Shopping alone for clothes, household necessities, or groceries
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Playing a game of skill such as bridge or chess, working on a hobby
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Heating water, making a cup of coffee, turning off the stove
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Preparing a balanced meal
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Keeping track of current events
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Paying attention to and understanding a TV program, book, or magazine
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Remembering appointments, family occasions, holidays, medications
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown

ElementDescription: Traveling out of the neighborhood, driving, or arranging to take public transportation
Notes: 0=Normal; 1=Has difficulty, but does by self; 2=Requires assistance; 3=Dependent; 8=Not applicable (e.g., never did); 9=Unknown
